lines.text:
[as Earp goes toward he saloon for a showdown with Indian Joe]
You know who he is?
No, we'll find out at his inquest.
You're a smart girl. Are you playin' me for a sucker, or do you wnt a cut in?
No, the only way you can cut me in... see that Curly Bill takes care of Earp.
Oh, you don't like him either?

[Emphatically]
No, I don't like him either. The happiest day of my life will be when I can sit on hiscoffin.

I don't wanna hear anymore, Yes, I'm a killer! What of it? Life's nothing! My life... anybody's life! What's the difference to a lot of rats caught in a trap? Whatthey do? How they act? Sarah, you've got to go!

[Somewhat dazed as he exits stage after returning to Tombstone after stage robbery]
Ah, so this is Tombstone.
Isn't it more thrilling to give life than take it away?

[after being hurriedly summoned]
What is it - a baby or a shooting?
